00030 namespace x2d {
00031 namespace config {
00032     
00036     struct conf 
00037     {
00038         conf(ifdstream stream)
00039         {            
00040             data.resize(stream.size());
00041             stream.read(&data.at(0), stream.size());
00042         }
00043         
00044         std::string data;
00045     };
00046     
00054     class configuration
00055     {
00056     public:
00062         configuration(kernel& k, resource_manager& res_man, const std::string& cfg_path);
00063         
00068         template <typename T>
00069         void bind(const config_key& key)
00070         {
00071             create_obj_bindings_.insert( 
00072                 std::make_pair(key, boost::bind(&configuration::create_object<T>, this, _1)) );
00073         }
00074         
00079         template <typename T>
00080         const boost::shared_ptr<T> create_object(const config_key& key)
00081         {
00082             return static_cast<object_cfg*>( &(*config_[key]) )->create<T>();
00083         }
00084         
00089         const boost::shared_ptr<object> create_object(const config_key& key);
00090         
00095         template <typename T>
00096         boost::shared_ptr<T> get_object(const config_key& key);
00097 
00102         template <typename T>
00103         T get_value(const config_key& key);
00104         
00105     private:
00110         void parse_file(const std::string& cfg_path);
00111         
00119         void parse(xml_node* root, const config_key& key=config_key(""));
00120 
00121         // parsers for primitive value types
00122         void parse_float(xml_node* node, const config_key& key);
00123         void parse_int(xml_node* node, const config_key& key);
00124         
00125         template<typename T>
00126         void parse_random(xml_node* node, const config_key& key);
00127         
00128         // kernel settings
00129         void parse_camera(xml_node* node, const config_key& key);
00130         void parse_viewport(xml_node* node, const config_key& key);
00131         void parse_input(xml_node* node, const config_key& key);
00132         
00133         // various parsers for each supported element type
00134         void parse_namespace(xml_node* node, const config_key& key);
00135         void parse_include(xml_node* node, const config_key& key);
00136         void parse_texture(xml_node* node, const config_key& key);
00137         void parse_sprite(xml_node* node, const config_key& key);
00138         void parse_animation(xml_node* node, const config_key& key);
00139         void parse_frame(xml_node* node, const config_key& key);
00140 
00141         // objects
00142         void parse_object(xml_node* node, const config_key& key);
00143         
00144         typedef boost::function<void(xml_node*,const config_key&)>              parser_type;        
00145         typedef boost::function<boost::shared_ptr<object>(const config_key&)>   binding_type;           
00146         
00147         kernel&                                 kernel_;
00148         resource_manager&                       res_man_;
00149         std::map<config_key, cfg_base_ptr>      config_;
00150         std::map<std::string, parser_type>      parsers_;
00151 
00152         std::map<config_key, binding_type>     create_obj_bindings_;
00153     };
00154     
00155 } // namespace config
00156 } // namespace x2d
00157 using namespace x2d::config;
